```{r}

```

```{r}
set.seed(42)

plot_cdf <- function(data) {
  data %>%
    arrange(x) %>%
    mutate(p = cumsum(p)) %>%
    ggplot(aes(x, p)) +
    geom_line() +
    labs(x = 'Velocity', y = 'Sample CDF')
}

sample_prior <- function(n, alpha, mu = 20, sigma = 3) {
  x <- rnorm(n, mean = mu, sd = sigma)
  v <- rbeta(n, shape1 = 1, shape2 = alpha)
  w <- cumprod(1 - c(0, head(v, -1)))
  tibble(x = x, p = v * w)
}

tibble(alpha = c(1, 10, 100)) %>%
  mutate(data = map(alpha, ~ sample_prior(n = 10000, .x))) %>%
  unnest(data) %>%
  mutate(alpha = str_c('alpha = ', alpha)) %>%
  group_by(alpha) %>%
  plot_cdf() +
  facet_wrap(vars(alpha), ncol = 1)
```
